                           ::The Past still::
::Koj::

Koj hugs Lilly picks up a White Lilly Flower "Lets meet tommorrow at the 
Iron Cross on the cliff as he sticks the flower on her shoulder.

::Lilly::

Lilly looks Koj "Its a Date"

::Laserbeak::

Laserbeak watchs them both leave and Flies back to SoundWave.

::SoundWave::

SoundWave goes and reports to Galvatron. "Koj is a traitor and the tales of 
his Autobot lover are true."

::Galvatron::

Looking at SoundWave "Where is the proof?"

::SoundWave::

Watches lasebeak transform into a Tape and plays it.

::Galvatron::

Listening to the tape "Kill them both with without mercy."
